entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:25 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 6:00 PM EST Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
